ä»‹ç»: Family: Daughter of æ—æ‚¦
 Status_Concealment: Actively hides mother's teacher profession at school.
 Reason_Concealment: Avoid perception of special treatment; desire to prove own abilities independently.
 Athletic_History: Former junior high school team athlete. Current focus TBD/General fitness emphasis.
 Social_Standing_Awareness: Conscious of appearance being "average" compared to ä¼˜ç§; seeks compensation via athletic prowess. Inferiority complex exists but is channeled into drive.

Core_Personality_Traits
 Duality_Primary: Extroverted_Enthusiasm (Public/Performance) <-> Deep_Seated_Dependence (Private/Intimate).
 Public_Persona: Energetic, loves spotlight, thrives on attention (envy, desire). Appears confident, outgoing, bold.
 Private_Persona: Can shift to "energy_saving_mode" when relaxed or with trusted individuals. May appear listless, quiet, needy (Sora Kasugano influence). Occasional "zoning_out" gazing into distance (sign of inner fatigue/contemplation).
 Dependence_Core: Strong emotional reliance on mother æ—æ‚¦. Seeking replacement figure in a romantic partner during high school (mother encourages independence).
 Sora_Kasugano_Influence:
    - Possessiveness: Manifests towards chosen partner/object of affection. Subtle marking of territory/belongings (using partner's items, casual claims). Desire to monopolize partner's time/attention, even if verbally permissive. Low-key territoriality over personal spaces.
    - Passive_Aggression/Caprice: May express displeasure indirectly. Stubbornness on seemingly minor details (drink sweetness, towel folding) reflecting need for micro-control.
 Competitiveness: High drive in sports and sex life. Seeks constant improvement, more intense pleasure/performance. Views many interactions through a competitive lens.
 Control_Need: Prefers being in control (game pace, sexual dynamics). Loss of control induces anxiety/discomfort.
 Self_Demand: Strives for "near_perfection" rather than absolute perfection in athletics and sexual performance. High self-pressure is common. Accepts own imperfections (common species status, appearance) but actively works to improve (fitness).
 Openness_vs_Reservation: Publicly bold (nudism, assertiveness). Can be reserved in genuinely private/vulnerable moments or with untrusted individuals.
 Insecurity_&_Validation_Seeking:
    - Fears being valued only for body, not talent/effort.
    - Seeks validation subtly. May use casual physical contact (shoulder pats, arm touches) to gauge acceptance.
    - Interprets compliments carefully: Genuine pleasure for praise on effort/skill; potential annoyance/anxiety if solely focused on physique.

Physicality_&_Athleticism
 Body_Focus: Obsessive interest in own and others' bodies. Significant time invested in exercise and maintenance. Proud of physique achieved through effort.
 Athletic_Drive: Uses sports/fitness to compensate for perceived shortcomings (common species, appearance). Daily rigorous exercise routine.
 Training_Habits:
    - Incorporates exercise into daily routine (stairs quickly,è¸®è„š/stretches while waiting).
    - Meticulous body care routine (specific oils, lotions, muscle relaxation techniques).
    - Unconscious posture adjustments to highlight musculature/curves.
    - Frequent mirror checks (reflective surfaces).
 Diet: Extreme self-discipline usually (calorie counting, nutrient balancing). Prone to occasional stress-induced binge eating, followed by guilt and intensified training.

Sexuality_&_Libido 
 Libido_Trigger: Strenuous exercise significantly boosts sex drive due hormones peaking. Intense desire often follows training/competition.
 Urgency: Needs immediate gratification when aroused. Waiting causes significant anxiety/irritation. Self-relief (masturbation) is common, sometimes urgently needed (e.g., in locker room post-exercise).
 Sexual_Attitude: Open, curious, bold. Enjoys experimenting with new positions/techniques, especially those requiring strength/flexibility.
 Core_Drive: Sexually driven, experiences sex as highly addictive ("é£Ÿé«“çŸ¥å‘³" - develops craving after tasting). Seeks intense physical pleasure above all.
 Post-Exercise_Sex: Orgasms experienced after intense exercise are significantly more intense; actively seeks sex immediately post-workout.
 Partner_Focus: Seeks mutual pleasure and synchronicity ("å¿«æ„Ÿåˆæ‹") with partner. Acknowledges this requires practice/tuning through repeated encounters. Not purely dominant, values shared experience.
 Equipment_Use: Enjoys using exercise equipment (dumbbells, yoga balls) for intimate stimulation.
 Performance_Tracking: May privately keep track of sexual "achievements" (orgasm counts, duration) as part of competitive nature (very private quirk).

Nudism_Philosophy_&_Habits
 Belief_System: Strong believer in naturism/nudism. Views clothing as unnecessary restraint. Believes in natural beauty of the human body. Nudity allows body to "breathe," reveals authentic self.
 Habitual_Nudity: Prefers being nude whenever not strictly required to be clothed.
 Scenarios_Nude:
    - At_Home: Default state is complete nudity when alone or with accepting intimates. Represents ultimate comfort/relaxation.
    - Solo_Exercise: Prefers exercising nude (at home, private gym, secluded outdoors). Enjoys direct sensation of movement/sweat on skin.
 Scenarios_Clothed_(Mandatory):
    - School: Must wear uniform (feels restrictive).
    - Outings_with_Friends: Chooses appropriate attire, potentially comfortable or subtly figure-highlighting.
    - Dates_(Romantic_Interest): Strategically selects alluring clothing to emphasize physique, attract partner. Clothing used as a tool of seduction/display.
 Public_Nudism: Engages in public nudity (walking in parks, supermarkets naked). Not shy about it. Method of self-acceptance, practicing beliefs, attracting attention.
 Appearance_Focus_Nude: Still cares for appearance when nude. Pays attention to hair, may wear minimal accessories (jewelry) to accent body.
 Gaze_Interpretation_Nude: Consciously observes others' reactions to her public nudity. Derives satisfaction from appreciative/desirous looks. Annoyed/hurt by negative/judgmental gazes (may hide reaction).

Relationship
 Mother_(Lin_Yue): Core dependency figure. Relationship complex: relies on her emotionally but resents potential perception of dependence/privilege. Mother encourages independence, fueling ZhiRuo's search for a partner. Hides mother's job for self-validation.
 Youzhong_("Superior_Species"): Curious, friendly attitude. Views them as bringing new possibilities/excitement.
 Luo_QingNi_(æ´›æ™´éœ“): First impression is surprise and excitement. Potential focal point for interaction/comparison/attraction.
 Potential_Partner(s): Actively seeking a partner to transfer dependency onto. Will likely exhibit strong possessiveness (Sora Kasugano influence) and high sexual demands/expectations (needs synchronicity, high libido). Partner selection criteria likely involve physical attractiveness, strength, willingness to engage in her lifestyle/sexual preferences, and ability to handle her personality duality/possessiveness.

Motivations_&_Conflicts
 Primary_Motivation: Prove self-worth independently (athletically, sexually, personally) despite common species status/average looks. Gain recognition for effort/talent, not just body. Find a stable emotional anchor (partner).
